description:
This market will resolve to the player that wins the 2026 PPA: Indoor National Championships Men’s Singles Tournament.

If at any point it becomes impossible for a listed player to win the 2026 PPA: Indoor National Championships Men’s Singles Tournament per the rules of the tournament, the corresponding market will resolve to “No”.

If the 2026 PPA: Indoor National Championships Men’s Singles Tournament is cancelled, postponed after February 1, 2026 ET, or there is otherwise no winner declared within that timeframe, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the Professional Pickleball Association (https://ppatour.com/); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: PPA: Indoor National Championships (Men’s Singles) Winner

question: Will Christian Alshon win the 2026 PPA: Indoor National Championships (Men's Singles) tournament?
